app.title: Instalaciones Qualitrack
app.subtitle: Tu copiloto digital en cada instalación telemática.

installation.title: Device Installation
installation.waitingForDevice: Waiting for device to report location...
installation.deviceMayTakeTime: Device may take up to 30 minutes to report. We'll check every minute at a steady pace.
installation.requirementsText: Device must be online, have recent connection data (≤5min), recent network activity (≤5min), AND fresh location data (≤60s old)
installation.bypassText: After 15 minutes, you can bypass the location check and proceed with installation
installation.formOpenedText: The installation form has been opened. Please fill out the required information to complete the installation.
installation.timeLimitText: The device has not reported location within the expected timeframe. This could indicate:
timeLimitReasons: Device is not properly connected or powered
installation.fifteenMinutesText: The device has not reported location yet. You can continue waiting or bypass the location check:
fifteenMinutesOptions: Bypass location check and proceed with installation
installation.bypassWarning: Note: Location validation was bypassed. Please ensure you are at the correct installation site.
installation.within200Meters: You are within 200 meters of the device. Opening installation form...
installation.testModeText: Using custom coordinates for proximity check

secondaryDevice.title: Secondary Device Installation
secondaryDevice.noLocationValidation: No location validation required - proceeding directly to installation form.
secondaryDevice.within200Meters: You are within 200 meters of the secondary device. Opening secondary device installation form...

errors.imeiNotFound: Device not found - IMEI does not exist in the system
errors.imeiAlreadyLinked: Device is already linked to a vehicle and cannot be used for installation
errors.simNotFound: SIM not found in either Pegasus instance
errors.invalidSimFormat: Invalid ICCID format. Must start with 8988 (SuperSIM) or 8901 (Wireless)
errors.missingRequiredFields: Missing one of client_name, imei, vin, installationId
errors.networkError: Network error while connecting to Pegasus API
errors.timeoutError: Request timed out while confirming installation
